remarks: If there is an upper limit on the degree of a polynomial that is lower than the degree of some exponent bag, then that exponent bag is unrepresented in the polynomial.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Mar-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 27-Jul-2019.)
statement:

mdegval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
mdegval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
mdegval.a $e |- A = { m e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' m " NN ) e. Fin } $.
mdegval.h $e |- H = ( h e. A |-> ( CCfld gsum h ) ) $.
mdeglt.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
medglt.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
mdeglt.lt $e |- ( ph -> ( D ` F ) < ( H ` X ) ) $.
mdeglt $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` X ) = .0. ) $.
